title: Moving a car 5 miles in peterborough - any help

posts.content:
A guy I had lined up has let me down. I need to move a splitty and kit car (both rolling projects but will need winching on) 5 miles from my house to a barn I've managed to secure.

Tried a few car transport firms, but due to the short distance either there not interested or they are really expensive (one was more expensive than when I moved another car 90 mies a year back - lost his details though).

If anyone can help it would really be appreciated, if you can pm me.

Cheers

David
try ebay sometimes people advertise on there and u pm them for a quote or you could hire a trailer
Try the AlldubzKlub (on facebook) someone might be able to help

Cheers found a chap in the end, pretty reasonable. The speedster was a bugger sitting do low, but got them moved in the end.

Just need to finish my wife's 1302 cabrio, before I can start these!
